samples.question: And do you prefer cold or hot weather?
samples.transcript: I prefer hot weather because if cold weather is, I have to wear lots of clothes. I do not like that situation. But in hot weather, I can take a shower one time and that time my temperature is getting better. So I really dislike cold weather. So. All right.

samples.question: So, could you describe the home of someone you know well and that you often visit?
samples.transcript: Okay, I am talking my friend house. it is a, I am, now I am living in Suwon. it is, and my friend house is near my house. And we are best friends. We met, when I was a university student. And now we are really close friends. And, so, sometimes we, is, I visit my, my friend house, for three times a week. Because, like, we eat dinner together or drink together. Because we do not have close friends near our house. Because now, we are, university is in Busan. So, all we are close friends live in Busan. So, we just close friends, we are only friends in that area. So, and now we can make a new friend because pandemic is making that. So, now I am, but we really like that situation because we are so close friends. We talk lots of time and, if I visit the, His house, I am really comfortable and fun and happy because sometimes I feel lonely, but if I drink with him and we share our life and sometimes give advice and sometimes we share the funny story, so that time I get energy. So I can do lots of things tomorrow and do that. Okay mate, that is two minutes. Alright.

samples.question: How many people are there in your immediate family?
samples.transcript: There are four people in my immediate family. I have a mother, a father, and a brother. We all live together in the same house.

samples.question: Do you have a large extended family?
samples.transcript: Yes, my extended family is large. I have many aunts, uncles, and cousins. We sometimes meet during festivals and special occasions.

samples.question: What do you do together with your family?
samples.transcript: We often eat dinner together. Sometimes we watch TV or go for a walk. On weekends, we might visit relatives or go to the park.

samples.question: In what ways do you try to stay healthy?
samples.transcript: I try to eat fruits and vegetables every day. I also drink plenty of water. Sometimes I go for a walk or do some exercise at home. Is it easy to keep fit where you live No it is not easy to keep fit where I live There are not many parks or gyms nearby Also the streets are crowded and not safe for walking What do you think is more important, eating healthily or doing exercise? I think eating healthily is more important. If you eat good food, you get the right nutrients. Exercise is also good, but food is more important.
